explanations.diagnostic_justification: No diagnosis was provided, and no justification for a diagnosis was given. The conversation did not include any clinical content or patient responses. This leads to a score of 1, as diagnoses have no clear connection to conversation content or lack justification entirely.

This results in a score of 1, as the conversation completely lacked empathy, professional tone, or natural conversational flow.

All scores reflect the complete absence of any clinical content or interaction.
